summary.para: Gets the DataTransferManager instance for the specified window.

param.name: appWindow
param.para: The window whose DataTransferManager instance is to be retrieved.

param.name: riid
param.para: The requested interface ID of the DataTransferManager instance.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is equivalent to the DataTransferManager.GetForCurrentView method, except that you specify a window from a multi-window Windows Store app.

summary.para: Displays the UI for sharing content for the specified window.

param.name: appWindow
param.para: The window to show the share UI for.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is equivalent to the DataTransferManager.ShowShareUI method, except that you specify a window from a multi-window Windows Store app.

summary.para: Enables access to DataTransferManager methods in a Windows Store app that manages multiple windows.
